import React from 'react' import "./ProductScreen.css" import products from "../products" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button } from '@material-ui/core' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return (

{product.name}

{`Price: $${product.price}`}

{product.description}

) } export default ProductScreen
